experiences.title: Full Stack Engineer
highlights: Developed role-based fintech application for startups to manage financials for multiple projects.
Designed and architected the backend, and implemented 3 statement financial model with inline table cells editing.
Integrated third-party accounting services, automating bookkeeping imports and optimizing operational efficiency.

experiences.title: Full Stack Engineer

Authored comprehensive technical documentation for a multi-tenant E-Commerce platform, accelerating onboarding by 25+ hours.

Implemented an algorithm for matching our 60M profiles with our partnerâ€™s internal database critical in the continuation of the multi-million deal.

experiences.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
highlights: Engineered and secured an admin panel, improving system monitoring efficiency and ensuring robust access control.

Resolved front-end bottlenecks and refactored core features while mentoring a team to deliver production-grade code, boosting UX metrics, increasing user retention by 25%, and reducing bug rates by 20% within 3 months.
